text: int main ( ) { int T , row , i , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; while ( T -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & row ) ; int a [ row ] [ row ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < row ; i ++ ) for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; for ( i = row - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] [ j ] > a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j ] ; } else { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] += a [ i ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
